programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us alongside Sabree Edwards for a trip around the Space Channel Universe, bringing you News, Movies, Music, Original Series & so much more! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : The Apollo Sale
programme.desc: Torie’s son Jason joins her on the road – she’s introducing him to the family business but will he be more hindrance than help? Larry turns ‘gastronaut’ when he comes across some space food; and a collector’s flash sale sees Cole bid for an Apollo 11 item with an incredible story – how Buzz Aldrin took Holy Communion on the moon. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Best of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space Channel selects the our favorite Cinespace movies Duration: 7200

programme.title: Planets with David Becker
programme.desc: For more than three decades, Grammy and Emmy nominated guitarist, composer, producer David Becker has continued to define himself as one of the best and most unique voices in jazz and contemporary music by combining diverse influences and a passion for the new and different, and his ability to play for the present while always keeping an eye on the past and future. He has led the critically acclaimed DAVID BECKER TRIBUNE to a worldwide audience by performing in more than 35 countries. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Welcome to Space Channel Universe! Bringing you the highlights of latest news, entertainment and so much more! Sit back and enjoy Space Channel Universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Dealers on a Mission
programme.desc: Larry takes on an impossible mission: he’s been asked find an item worn in space by Apollo 15 legend Al Worden. It’s going to be tough but Larry is keen to succeed – if he pulls it off he gets to meet the great man himself. Torie searches for Russian space items for a museum in San Francisco. And Cole goes on the hunt for an item from Apollo 13 – his search takes him to Las Vegas and one of the biggest collectors in the space dealing world. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship from another world crashes in the rural Arizona desert. An amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us as we travel through the Space Channel Universe and experience the Final Frontier like never before. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Money Trouble
programme.desc: In the world of space dealing everyone is having money trouble. Larry gets the offer of a lifetime: a Soviet era space suit. But there’s a problem – the price tag. To be in with a chance he has to clear stock and raise some dough. Torie pays big for an Apollo 11 artefact but it’s not what it seems – has she thrown away $10,000? And Cole meets Apollo 7 legend Walt Cunningham who shares memories of his time in space. Cole has money to spend – what he wants to know is will Walt part with any of his space items? Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: UFO Conclusion
programme.desc: What is the alien agenda? Why has the government gone to such great lengths to stifle the overwhelming evidence that otherworldly creatures exist? Some of our greatest minds unveil the truth behind this massive cover-up. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel's Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar System: Secrets of the Universe

programme.title: Space Channel - Cinespace Music
programme.desc: Space and music go so well together.....these Cinespace movies prove our point. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies- Its a dangerous universe!
programme.desc: The Boogies, SkyFighter and Caronte show that space is a dangerous place. Especially when it lands on the ground. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: The Day The Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warninf for all mankind. The people of Earth must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200
